Articles.Content: for some reason, i can not change the resolution above 1920x1080, cause my monitor is a 1920x1200 monitor. and it can get very annoying.

Hi @legotex9, KSP will show the resolutions that the Unity engine detects from the host OS, you can try manually editing the settings.cfg but this may not work as expected.

Look for these lines.

SCREEN_RESOLUTION_WIDTH
SCREEN_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT

thanks for the help. works well, but makes any thing else runing in the background slower than a trying to make a ship go to duna and back using ONLY RCS THRUSTERS. no i am not going to try to do that.

Edited September 17, 2016 by legotex9
spell fixes + forgot word
